text: Robert John Gourley (February 20, 1878 - March 11, 1976) was a Canadian curler. He was the skip of the 1931 Brier Champion team, representing Manitoba."Gourley dead at 98", Winnipeg Free Press, Monday, March 15, 1976, Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada, pg. 54 ==References== Category:Brier champions Category:1878 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Curlers from Manitoba Category:People from the Regional Municipality of Peel Category:Sportspeople from Winnipeg Category:Canadian male curlers
title: Bob Gourley
